Description:
We are new cosmetic company in Dubai, and we are recruiting for Digital marketing position (preferred Ladies). The candidate will develop, implement, and manage marketing campaigns promoting the organization's products. The candidate will enhance brand awareness, drive web traffic, and acquire customers.Key Responsibilities:Develop marketing strategies that align with our cosmetic companyâ€™s goals

Collaborate with management teams to produce engaging content and optimize user experience through including web and content developments.
Stay up-to-date with emerging digital marketing trends and technologiesQualifications:Master's degree in marketing, communications, or related field
2 to 3 years of experience in digital marketing or related field
Strong understanding of digital marketing channels, including SEO, PPC, social media, email marketing, and display advertising
Proficient in marketing automation tools
Excellent analytical skills and experience with web analytics tools (e.g., Google Analytics)
Strong project management skills  Fluent in English and Arabic.Skills
